detail_desc: Small purse in imitation leather with a tab and press-stud. Ten compartments: one with a zip, six card slots and three slightly larger. Size 1.5x9x13 cm.
Short, chunky-knit jumper in a cotton blend with braided details at the top and raglan sleeves.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Double-breasted coat in a wool weave. Collar with a hook-and-eye fastening and shoulder tabs with a button, a loose yoke front and back, flap side pockets with a button and one inner pocket. Detachable, adjustable tie belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle, an adjustable tab with a covered metal buckle at the cuffs and a pleat at the hem with a concealed tab and button. Lined.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a text print. Hood with a wrapover front, long sleeves with ribbed cuffs, and slits in the sides. Gently rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Wide trousers in soft twill with a high waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, back pockets and straight, wide legs with creases.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric. Elasticated, frill-trimmed seam at the hips with a decorative bow, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Unlined.
5-pocket, slim-fit shorts in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Adjustable, elasticated waist, a zip fly and button and hard-worn details that are patched on the inside.
Oversized cardigan knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, buttons down the front and detachable tie belt at the waist. Low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with reversible sequins at the top (sizes 1½-3Y with normal sequins), a gathered seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.
Cable-knit jumper in a soft cotton blend with a V-neck, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Stocking-stitched back.
5-pocket trousers in stretch fabric with a high waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.

Straight-cut coat in a felted wool blend with a high, stand-up collar with concealed press-studs. Zip and wind flap down the front and zipped side pockets. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Shortie briefs in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with a mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Pull-on trousers woven in a Tencel™ lyocell blend in a relaxed fit with an elasticated drawstring waist and slightly lower crotch. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Long shirt in an airy chiffon weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and an asymmetric hem with slits in the sides.
T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Three-strand necklace of thin metal chains with different-shaped pendants. Adjustable length 38-46 cm.
Leather loafers with pointed toes and a tab across the front. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 3.5 cm.
Treggings in stretch, denim-look jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Skirt in tulle with glitter. Elastic waistband with a bow, seam with a small frill trim and a flounced tier to the hem. Lined.
Jumper in a soft, loose knit with a V-neck, long raglan sleeves and roll edges at the cuffs and hem. Longer at the back.
Loafers in soft leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Straight-cut top in ribbed jersey with a V-neck. Relaxed fit with dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric with reversible sequins. Long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband to hold in and shape the waist. Key pocket in the waistband.
Suede sandals with a front strap with a decorative bow, heel strap and ties that can be wound around the ankles. Leather insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 6.5 cm.
Trousers in rustly nylon with a high waist and tapered legs. Elastication and an elastic drawstring at the waist and hems, and patch front pockets.
V-neck cardigan in a soft rib knit with buttons down the front and dropped shoulders. Long sleeves, patch pockets and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric with wide, adjustable shoulder straps, lined cups with space for breast prostheses, and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in viscose crêpe jersey with a slightly wider neckline, short, flounced sleeves and short slits in the sides.
Prolong the life of your favourite clothes. Mend, patch and continue to wear them. The patches can be ironed onto garments.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, a detachable tie belt at the waist and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.

Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a round neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Wide flounces down the front that continue over the shoulders to the back. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.
Swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Knee-length, cold shoulder dress in patterned, crinkled chiffon with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and two flounces at the top that continue over the arms. Gathered seam at the waist with narrow elastication and an airy, softly draping skirt with a seam and flounce at the hem. Lined.
Round-necked T-shirt in sturdy cotton piqué.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Hat in braided paper straw with a broderie anglaise band. Unlined. Width of brim 4.5 cm.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar and buttons down the front. Flap chest pockets with a button, side pockets, buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
5-pocket trousers in patterned stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs.
Trousers in stretch denim made from a cotton blend. Concealed elastication, a small frill trim and a press-stud at the waist, a fake fly, fake front and real back pockets. Patterned cotton lining.
Cardigan in textured-knit cotton with a round neck, buttons down the front and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jacket in washed, stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Pocket flaps at the front with a button.
Trainers with elasticated lacing at the front, a padded edge and tongue and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles.
Fancy dress costume with a zip down the front, hood with appliqués and ribbing at the cuffs and hems.
Fine-knit trainer socks in fast-drying functional fabric with elastication around the top.

Fully lined balconette bikini top with decorative gathers at the front. Moulded, padded cups that lift and shape the bust, wide, adjustable, detachable shoulder straps that can be fastened in various ways, and a wide metal fastener at the back.
Jersey leggings with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, covered buttons down the front and long sleeves with frilled cuffs.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton ribbed jersey. Round neckline with a narrow trim.
Poncho in an airy, patterned weave with an open front and long fringes at the hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length, washed denim jeans in a relaxed fit with a high waist, zip fly and button and straight legs with cut-off, raw-edge hems.
Trainers in mesh with a lightly padded edge and tongue. Jersey linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with gently dropped shoulders with press-studs at one side, and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button. Unlined.
Trunks in stretch cotton jersey with flatlock seams, short legs, an elasticated waist and a lined front.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Bolero in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend containing glittery threads with a button at the neck and long sleeves.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front. The cotton content of the shorts is organic.

Briefs in ribbed jersey designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin. Low waist, lined gusset and a high cut at the back. The polyamide content of the briefs is partly recycled.
Hi-top canvas trainers with a lightly padded shaft, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Blouse in an airy weave. Deep V-neck with a crocheted trim and lacing, long, wide sleeves with embroidery and scalloped edges, and a smocked seam at the waist. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in lightweight, airy Tencel™ lyocell denim with a V-neck and short puff sleeves. Gathered elastication at the top and down the sleeves, a seam under the bust, concealed elastication at the back of the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a rib-knit nylon blend with a deep V-neck front and back, low dropped shoulders, long sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and pleats at the front. Fake fly and press-stud, side pockets and fake welt back pockets.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.

Shirt woven in a stretch cotton blend with a narrow turn-down collar, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, darts at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist to create a fitted silhouette.

Trousers in a sturdy cotton and viscose weave. High waist, an extended waistband with concealed hook-and-eye fasteners and a zip fly. Discreet, buttoned pockets in the side seams, a jetted back pocket with a button and straight, wide legs with creases.
Half-shaft wellingtons with a loop at the back, fabric linings and insoles and fluted rubber soles.
Shorts in soft cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, side pockets, a welt back pocket with a button and a zip fly with a button.
Bucket hat in soft, felted wool. Width of brim 6.5 cm.

Blouse in airy, patterned chiffon with an opening and buttons at the front, narrow ties at the top, long sleeves with flounced cuffs, and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. The polyester content of the blouse is partly recycled.

Shirt in woven fabric with a lined drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric. Press-studs down the front, flap chest pockets, long sleeves with press-studs at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, round neck and short puff sleeves trimmed with a sewn-on bow. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
